doc.title: Universal Special: Roosevelt - Man of Destiny
doc.plot: A biography of Franklin D. Roosevelt compiled from newsreels and stills from the time in 1933 he first took the office of the President of the United States until his death. It includes footage of some of his most famous speeches and also the WWII Big Three meetings with Churchill and Stalin. It concludes with the newsreel scenes of his funeral procession and burial in April of 1945.
